desc: Conceptual and sculptural jewelry. open to experimentation while embracing oddity, and celebrates imperfections. The language of the collection lies in proportion, wearability, minimal yet statement pieces for an everyday wear. It values the craftsmanship and the handmade process of every product.

layout.text: The intimate moment when jewelry becomes part of you - suffused with your warmth and memories - A memento of love, bond, and relationship
